definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: The appropriate direction lost many elites in those early annuals, it was under the archaic divine tree to fair cage him.
sentences.chinese: 当年正道损失无数精英，才将他困在上古神木之下。

sentences.english: He led them by a straight way to a city where they could dwell.
sentences.chinese: 引领他们走入正道，走入可安居的城廓。

sentences.english: Small jia she borrow wood, injured advice he should return to the path from the rivers lake.
sentences.chinese: 小嘉便借木荣受伤之事，劝告他应重返正道退出江湖。

sentences.english: Please ordain me a Bhikkhu so that I can develop the Noble Eightfold Path.
sentences.chinese: 请给我授戒让我成为比丘，这样我就能够修行八正道。

sentences.english: He forgave his good-for-nothing brother for the purpose of maintaining brotherhood.
sentences.chinese: 他宽恕了他那不走正道的兄弟，借以维持手足知情。

sentences.english: After going straight for a bit, he returned to petty thieving again.
sentences.chinese: 走了一段正道后，他又重操旧业当起小偷来。

sentences.english: The United States and its allies are right to balance values and strategic interests.
sentences.chinese: 美国及其盟国积极去平衡价值观和战略利益才是正道。

sentences.english: Bezos was so wrong he was right.
sentences.chinese: 贝索斯正因为错得如此离谱，他才找到了正道。

sentences.english: Listen, my son, and be wise, and keep your heart on the right path.
sentences.chinese: 我儿，你当听，当存智慧，好在正道上引导你的心。

sentences.english: He led them back to the right way.
sentences.chinese: 他把他们带回到正道上来。

sentences.english: Jotham grew powerful because he walked steadfastly before the Lord his God.
sentences.chinese: 约坦在耶和华他神面前行正道，以致日渐强盛。

sentences.english: You wanna do better for yourself. You gotta go the right path.
sentences.chinese: 你想自己变得更好，你必须走正道。

sentences.english: Are the Noble Eightfold Path developed in me?
sentences.chinese: 是否巳经开发了八正道？

sentences.english: One who follows Jesus who can lead people to the right way.
sentences.chinese: 跟随基督的人，能领人走正道。

sentences.english: Rhys Davids is of the opinion that the Eightfold Path is a later systematisation.
sentences.chinese: 戴维斯夫人是认为八正道是后来才系统化的。

sentences.english: It’s not clear why a human instinct to nurse went awry.
sentences.chinese: 人类喂养母乳的天性为何会偏离正道，这点并不清楚。

definition: lit. devil's gate, crooked path (idiom); corrupt practices/crooked methods/dishonesty
dissenting religious sect (idiom); heretical school of opinion/dissident group
the Way of the King/statecraft/benevolent rule/virtuous as opposed to the Way of Hegemon 霸道
lit. true religion/orthodox religion/orthodox Christianity/Islam (in the writing of Chinese or Hui theologians)
Daoist School of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC), based on the teachings of Laozi or Lao-tze 老子[Lao3 zi3] (c. 500 BC-) and Zhuangzi 庄子 (369-286 BC)
